title: Traefik Mesh Overview
description:
## Traefik Mesh

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Traefik Mesh instances so you can monitor related metrics.

For further reading on monitoring Traefik Mesh, see:

- [Official Traefik Mesh integration docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/traefik_mesh/#data-collected)
  
Clone this template to make changes and add your own graphs and widgets.

definition.content: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Traefik Mesh deployment to help monitor your system.

**Refer to the following resources for more information**

- [Datadog Traefik Mesh documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/traefik_mesh/?tab=host#overview)

- [Available Traefik Mesh metrics](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/traefik_mesh/?tab=host#metrics)
This is an overview of service checks, monitors and connect statuses of your Traefik Mesh deployments
Traefik Mesh is Golang based. The below metrics displays some Go runtime metrics that can help in troubleshooting performance or bottleneck issues.
